content: #68905 needs to be backported to beta (which just came out today), but is still in FCP for 2 weeks. Should we consider ending FCP early in this case?
It's not strictly required since the regression hasn't reached stable yet, but I feel somewhat uncomfortable leaving a known regression in beta for 2 weeks.
we generally try to avoid backporting without it landing into nightly first
I would be up for skipping the trailer of FCP anyway
